keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey voted on Thursday to relocate the piece by Fritz Koenig, which survived the 2001 terrorist attack on the towers, to Liberty Park.

headline.print_headline: ‘Sphere’ Sculpture to Return to World Trade Center Site
headline.main: Enduring ‘Sphere’ Sculpture to Return to World Trade Center Site

snippet: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey voted on Thursday to relocate the piece by Fritz Koenig, which survived the 2001 terrorist attack on the towers, to Liberty Park....
abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey approves measure to move Fritz Koenig sculpture Sphere for Plaza Fountain, former centerpiece of World Trade Center before Sept 11, 2001, attacks, from its current home in Battery Park to St Nicholas National Shrine in Liberty Park, which overlooks new World Trade Center site.
